pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可爱的，可喜的；令人愉快的

bilingual.source: He also saw hundreds of delighted students who had turned out to welcome him.
bilingual.target: 他还看到了数百名出来欢迎他的高兴的学生。

bilingual.source: She said she didn't care about it, but I believe she was secretly delighted.
bilingual.target: 她说不在乎，但我相信她是暗暗高兴的。

bilingual.source: I am delighted to find myself in such a circle .
bilingual.target: 令我高兴的是，我有这么一个好的环境。

bilingual.source: I am delighted to announce that the first 24 will open this year.
bilingual.target: 我也很高兴的宣布首批的24所今年将要开学了。

bilingual.source: Be in a good mood, happy, cheerful, joyful, Joyous, pleased, delighted
If a chance of traveling abroad happened Bob's way, he would be delighted.
bilingual.target: 要是鲍勃有机会出国旅行，他一定会高兴的。

bilingual.source: If a chance of traveling abroad happened Bob's way, he would be delighted .
bilingual.target: 要是鲍勃有机会出国旅行，他一定会高兴的。

bilingual.source: What delighted me most was that most of the students did well in the exam.
bilingual.target: 最使我感到高兴的是大多数学生在考试中都考得很好。

bilingual.source: Judging from the delighted look on his face, he is satisfied with the result.
bilingual.target: 从他脸上高兴的表情判断，他对结果很满意。

bilingual.source: Not in the least; but if I can serve you in any way I shall be delighted.
bilingual.target: 猜不到，但假如我可以做出什么为您效劳的话，我是很高兴的。

yingyinNormal.en: She'd be delighted! Yes! Butter. Great. Great! Very nice. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她很乐意！太好了！吧特。太好了。太好了。你人真好。谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Please, have a seat, LeAnn. I'm delighted you've agreed to come on board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请坐吧，莉安。我很高兴你同意加入了。

yingyinNormal.en: Offended? Why would I be offended? I'm thrilled, I'm delighted. I'm just rather surprised.
yingyinNormal.zh: 生气？怎么会呢？我很高兴，很开心，我就是有些意外。

yingyinNormal.en: Grandpa Pig needs help. Please, could you rescue him? Madam, I would be delighted. Hurray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爷爷需要一些帮助。拜托了，你能去救他吗？夫人，这将会是我的荣幸。太好了！

yingyinNormal.en: I'll be delighted, Danny, if you'll be my first mate. Yes, please. Launch the boat. Aye aye, Captain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没问题，丹尼，但是你要来当我的副船长。好的，我非常乐意。让船下水吧。遵命船长！

yingyinNormal.en: I'll be delighted, Danny, if you'll be my first mate. Yes, please. Launch the boat. Aye, aye, Captain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没问题，丹尼，但是你要来当我的副船长。好的，我非常乐意。让船下水吧。遵命船长！

yingyinNormal.en: My granddaughter told me that you were delighted when she decided, not to make her debut this weekend?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我孙女告诉我，当她决定不参加社交舞会时你很高兴？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Losing a job is hurting: you are not <highlight>delighted</highlight> at the prospect of doubling your income from the generous state.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 失业是一件让人很受伤的事情：你不会高兴地想着从慷慨的政府那里领取双倍的收入。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: And as a passionate musician, Schellenberg was <highlight>delighted</highlight> when he turned up credible evidence that music has transfer effects on general intelligence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一名充满激情的音乐家，当谢伦伯格找到可靠的证据证明音乐对一般智力有转移作用时，他感到非常高兴。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Scott is <highlight>delighted</highlight> to get food advice from a physician who is program director of the nearby Mary and Dick Allen Diabetes Center.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯科特很高兴能从附近玛丽和迪克·艾伦糖尿病中心的项目主任医师那里得到饮食建议。

examination_example.sentence: Mom would be absolutely <highlight>delighted</highlight> to see you again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 再次见到你，妈妈一定很高兴。

examination_example.sentence: We should be <highlight>delighted</highlight> to pursue knowledge for its own sake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该乐于追求知识本身。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Officials were <highlight>delighted</highlight> with the new arrival, especially as black rhinos are known for being difficult to breed in captivity (圈养).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官员们对这头新犀牛的到来感到高兴，尤其是因为黑犀牛以难以在圈养中繁殖而闻名。

examination_example.sentence: Obviously we're all absolutely <highlight>delighted</highlight> to welcome another calf to our black rhino family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 显然，我们都非常高兴地欢迎我们的黑犀牛家族再添一头小犀牛。

examination_example.sentence: I was <highlight>delighted</highlight> at the presence of such a student.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我对这样一个学生的出现感到很高兴。
